name: Schema Schema
description: A JSON schema that describes the structure of a JSON schema

types.name: Schema
types.description: The type containing the schema metadata

properties.name: version
properties.description: The version number of the schema format as a URI

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the schema

properties.name: result
properties.description: The top-level container generated by the schema when processing a file that matches the schema

properties.name: types
properties.description: A list of types describing the structure of the schema being defined.

types.name: Type
types.description: A container of properties collectively defining a type

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the type

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A list of properties that define the type

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the property

properties.name: example
properties.description: An example of the property in use

properties.name: optional
properties.description: An optional flag indicating if this property must be defined in the JSON file. If the property is not included, it is assumed that this value defaults to false, thus making the property required
